metadata.feature_description: Compare analytics data between two different time periods to identify trends

steps.action: Login to DNN site as SuperUser
steps.actual: Login successful, PersonaBar visible with Dashboard menu

steps.action: Click on Dashboard > Community Analytics in PersonaBar
steps.expected: Community Analytics panel should open showing analytics dashboard with period selectors and comparison options
steps.actual: Community Analytics menu item highlighted but panel content area remained empty/blank. JavaScript error occurred: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function at social-dashboard-combined-instance.js:1025

issues: Critical JavaScript error prevents Community Analytics module from loading: 'TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function'
The error occurs in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js at line 1025 during module initialization
The utility.serializeCustomDate function is expected but not available in the PersonaBar utility object

steps.action: Attempted to navigate to Community Analytics to test period comparison
steps.expected: Should be able to select a time period and view comparison with previous period
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Test cannot be executed - Community Analytics module does not render due to JavaScript initialization error

steps.action: Attempted to access analytics dashboard to view percentage changes between periods
steps.expected: Should display percentage changes showing increase/decrease from previous period
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Test cannot be executed - Community Analytics module does not render due to JavaScript initialization error

steps.action: Attempted to access analytics dashboard to verify trend indicators
steps.expected: Should display up/down trend indicators based on comparison data
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Test cannot be executed - Community Analytics module does not render due to JavaScript initialization error

steps.action: Attempted to access analytics dashboard to test behavior with no previous data
steps.expected: Should handle gracefully when no previous period data exists
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Test cannot be executed - Community Analytics module does not render due to JavaScript initialization error

steps.action: Attempted to access analytics dashboard to test different period types (Year/Month/Week/Day)
steps.expected: Should be able to switch between Year, Month, Week, Day periods and see comparative data
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Test cannot be executed - Community Analytics module does not render due to JavaScript initialization error

observations: Critical Bug: The Community Analytics module fails to initialize due to a missing utility function. The error 'TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function' occurs at social-dashboard-combined-instance.js:1025

Code review shows the serializeCustomDate function is called extensively in analytics.js, social-dashboard-instance.js, and social-dashboard-combined-instance.js to handle date serialization for the comparative analytics feature
The utility object is provided by the PersonaBar framework but appears to be missing the serializeCustomDate method at runtime
The API endpoints in CommunityAnalyticsController.cs support comparative analytics with 'comparativeTerm' parameter supporting values like '1 y', '1 m', '1 w', '1 d' for comparing periods
The feature code exists and is designed to allow Year, Month, Week, Day period comparisons with custom date range support, but cannot be tested due to the initialization failure
All planned test scenarios for Comparative Analytics feature cannot be executed because the UI does not render
